divs: Sighting Detailsi was on my balcony ... exactly 11:45 pm.. July 29th ... from a distance i had witnessed a bright star light object in the sky.. there were no aircrafts or lights in the sky . the overhead light coming from west to east was moving fast over a long distance in the shape as if you were going to draw a checkmark on a piece of paper. The beginning of the checkmark when pencil touches the paper coming towards east and then at same speed would be the long part of the checkmark. I felt over welmed and surprised by the event... my reactions were very reactive towards something I never believed in before . The object moved so fast away it literally did not give me time to blink...
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There were no other sightings in Edmonton on or around July 29th 2012
Summary: it looked like star from a far distance.. from the west to the east like a checkmark movement as it flew away.. the total sighting was about 8 seconds
